title: The Deep End Volume 1 - Dakota Bound
description: This is the first in a series of erotic romance novellas. If you don't like books with Alpha males, controversial content, and descriptive sexual scenes, You may wish to stay in safer, more shallow waters. If, however, you enjoy a hot, steamy read filled with passion and drama... by all means... venture into "The Deep End".Nicole is fresh out of a small town Missouri high school and new to Dallas. Dakota is a 24 year old domineering player with a well-earned reputation for hit-and-run sexual encounters. Sparks fly and passions ignite as these two learn to navigate the rapids of love and lust, all the while misunderstanding and family interference threatens to drown any hopes they have for a lasting relationship.
author: Lourie Nolan
